sentence.Network_en: Even her mother - in - law's grass - covered grave mound became a source of comfort.
sentence.Network_cn: 再则,孩子也渐渐地大了,茅屋里,斜坡上, 总 荡漾着他们的嚷叫和笑声.

sentence.Network_en: They entered the grass covered land.
The reedy grass covered the whole area.
sentence.Network_cn: 又细又长的草覆盖着整个地区.

sentences.sentence: "wide grass-covered plains as far as the eye could see"
